methods.name: put
methods.comment: Associate a define "name" with a Preprocessor parser token match.

methods.name: putArg
methods.comment:
Add an args definition for a define with arguments
     #define bubba(a,b)   (a or b)

methods.name: containsKey
methods.comment: See if the define table contains a definition

methods.name: remove
methods.comment: Remove a definition from the known defines.

return.comment: return the defined token for the named define.

methods.name: isArg
methods.comment: Check if a define has args.

methods.name: removeArg
methods.comment: Get rid of args for a define

methods.name: toString
methods.comment: display a string for the named define.

methods.javadoc: @return an iterator over the defined string names
methods.name: getDefineNames

return.comment: an iterator over the defined string names

methods.name: isNumeric
methods.comment: Check if the token that defined this define was numeric

methods.name: expand
methods.comment: do the final expansion of "##" concats in the define strings that protect normal macro substitution.

methods.javadoc: Given a data type manager, populate defines with constant values as Enums
methods.name: populateDefineEquates
methods.comment: Given a data type manager, populate defines with constant values as Enums
